query:
SELECT 
  YEAR(dataVenda) as ano,
  MONTH(dataVenda) as mes,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  SUM(valorTotal) as total
FROM vendas
WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025 AND excluido = 0
GROUP BY YEAR(dataVenda), MONTH(dataVenda)
ORDER BY mes
